401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

409.description: Request was rejected due a conflict with an existing resource.

full_refresh.description: If true, this update will reset all tables before running.

validate_only.description: If true, this update only validates the correctness of pipeline source code but does not materialize or publish any datasets.

cause.description:
A list of tables to update without fullRefresh. If both refresh_selection and
full_refresh_selection are empty, this is a full graph update. Full Refresh on a table means
that the states of the table will be reset before the refresh.

refresh_selection.description:
A list of tables to update with fullRefresh. If both refresh_selection and
full_refresh_selection are empty, this is a full graph update. Full Refresh on a table means
that the states of the table will be reset before the refresh.

post.description: Starts a new update for the pipeline. If there is already an active update for the pipeline, the request will fail and the active update will remain running.
